summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3606 for the improvement of East 59th Street, from 51st Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; by grading and graveling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 44552, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
